cltl.comment: Low troposphere taken as surface to 680hPa

clth.comment: High troposphere taken as 440hPa to the top of the atmosphere

rluscs.long_name: Surface Upwelling Longwave Flux in Air Assuming Clear Sky

vegstress.long_name: Soil Water Stress Index for Plant Transpiration over Land

snct.long_name: Snow Covered Fraction including vegetation masking over land

fco2all.long_name: Surface Carbon Mass Flux into the Atmosphere

fwtd.long_name: grid-cell fraction allowing upward capillary fluxes from wtd

rsdscsaf.long_name: Surface Clear-Sky Aerosol-Free Downwelling Shortwave Radiation

rsuscsaf.long_name: Surface Clear-Sky Aerosol-Free Upwelling Shortwave Radiation

rldscsaf.long_name: Surface Clear-Sky Aerosol-Free Downwelling Longwave Radiation

rluscsaf.long_name: Surface Clear-Sky Aerosol-Free Upwelling Longwave Radiation

cdnctop.long_name: Liquid Cloud Droplet Number Concentration at Cloud Top

RADasy550aer.long_name: Asymmetry parameter at 550nm as seen in the radiative scheme

RADssa550aer.long_name: Single Scattering Albedo at 550nm as seen in the radiative scheme

RADod550aer.long_name: Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm as seen in the radiative scheme

RADabs550aer.long_name: Absorption Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm as seen in the radiative scheme

clmcalipsoice.long_name: CALIPSO Ice Mid Level Cloud Fraction

clhcalipsoice.long_name: CALIPSO Ice High Level Cloud Fraction

cllcalipsoliq.long_name: CALIPSO Liquid Low Level Cloud Fraction

clmcalipsoliq.long_name: CALIPSO Liquid Mid Level Cloud Fraction

clhcalipsoliq.long_name: CALIPSO Liquid High Level Cloud Fraction

cllcalipsoun.long_name: CALIPSO Undefined-Phase Low Level Cloud Fraction

clmcalipsoun.long_name: CALIPSO Undefined-Phase Mid Level Cloud Fraction

clhcalipsoun.long_name: CALIPSO Undefined-Phase High Level Cloud Fraction

parasolCRefl.comment: Simulated cloud reflectance from PARASOL as seen at the top of the atmosphere for 5 solar zenith angles. Valid only over ocean and for one viewing direction (viewing zenith angle of 30 degrees and relative azimuth angle 320 degrees).

cltlidarradar.long_name: Lidar and Radar Total Cloud Fraction

tauisccp.long_name: Mean Optical Depth as Calculated by the ISCCP Simulator

meantbisccp.long_name: Mean all-sky 10.5 micron brightness temperature as calculated by the ISCCP Simulator

meantbclrisccp.long_name: Mean clear-sky 10.5 micron brightness temperature as calculated by the ISCCP Simulator

ssa550aer.long_name: Aerosol Single Scattering Albedo at 550 nm

TACabs550aer.long_name: Absorption Aerosol Optical Depth at 550nm in the aerosol scheme

od550acldaer.long_name: Above-cloud Aerosol Optical Depth at 550 nm

od550ssbin1.long_name: Sea-salt Bin 1 Aerosol Optical Depth at 550 nm

od550ssbin2.long_name: Sea-salt Bin 2 Aerosol Optical Depth at 550 nm

od550dustbin1.long_name: Dust Bin 1 Aerosol Optical Depth at 550 nm

od550dustbin2.long_name: Dust Bin 2 Aerosol Optical Depth at 550 nm

ext550ss.long_name: Sea-Salt Aerosol Extinction Coefficient at 550 nm

ext550dust.long_name: Dust Aerosol Extinction Coefficient at 550 nm

ext550so4.long_name: Sulfate Aerosol Extinction Coefficient at 550 nm

ext550bc.long_name: Black Carbon Aerosol Extinction Coefficient at 550 nm

ext550oa.long_name: Organic Matter Aerosol Extinction Coefficient at 550 nm

necb.long_name: net rate of C accumulation (or loss)

fDeforestToL.long_name: carbon transferred to soil or litter pools due to lulucf processes

fRegrowth.long_name: carbon flux due to plant regrowth related to land-use or land-cover change processes

fFireBCarb.long_name: Black Carbon Flux into Atmosphere due to Emission from natural Fire

cSoilPools.long_name: Carbon mass in each model soil pool (summed over vertical levels)

tSoilPools.long_name: turnover rate of each model soil carbon pool
